post_title: RTL is starting a war on eggnog

comments.author: BeanOfKnowledge
comments.body: "We paid an Intern 5‚Ç¨ to say a thing you like is bad"

comments.author: F34rthebat
comments.body: Yo...RTL...Know your place and shut your mouth.

comments.author: Fun-Ad9804
comments.body: Hey RTL journalist who wrote this piece. In my part of Luxembourg it‚Äôs actually sunny! But I wish you ‚Äúnone‚Äù ;) You could have just said unpleasant or unappealing but gross???

comments.author: Root_the_Truth
comments.body:
Can we petition to ban the word eggnog from r/Luxembourg?

I commend the innovative approach to this marketing campaign from Luxlait (I'm one of your biggest fans except for the cheese) but this is going too far and is spamming the Sub.

comments.author: Glittering_Space5018
comments.body: I tried it and what takes me aback is the fake alcohol taste.

comments.author: Vengarth
comments.body:
For the longest time, I also thought it was gross, but I had a taste again this year and liked it.

I wouldn't drink it constantly, but once in a while, it's good.

comments.author: zarzarbinksthe4th
comments.body: Harnessing the power of click bait ü§£

comments.author: notcomplainingmuch
comments.body: 'Ur mom is what?', is the standard retort.

comments.body: RTL, you sly devil you üòÇ. Biting the hand that gives you articles üòÇ.

comments.author: Rally_Sport
comments.body: Apologies but banning the word is not the way to go. Going out and buying all the EGGNOG IS !

comments.author: attilio_
comments.body: Yeah it's literally cream with chemicals, don't know why people on here are crazy about it.. not even real eggs inside

comments.author: Root_the_Truth
comments.body: The eggnog isn't great though. If it had real alcohol in it I'd be in but the artificial flavour takes away from it. Loving the vanilla however!
